document_data.name: Natural Attunement
document_data.mainbody: '''''Natural attunement''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[enchantment]] [[spell]] used by [[Ranger (priest)|rangers]], specialty priests devoted to [[Gwaeron Windstrom]].
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to become fully attuned to their environment, picking up every detail and heightening their awareness. Their tracking skills were temporarily increased allowing skilled trackers to even track flying creatures.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s a handful of dirt smeared on the caster's palms to cast.
